metadata.title: CVE-2024-25385 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in flvmeta v.1.2.2 allows a local attacker to cause a denial ofservice via the flvmeta/src/flv.c:375:21 function in flv_close.

criterions.comment: flvmeta: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
